positions.subtitle: Deloitte India (Offices of the US)
positions.description: External Auditor with the Audit and Assurance Practice of Deloitte, primarily handling US-based clients in the Retail, Wholesale & Distribution, (Consumer & Industrial Products) Sector. Responsibilities:• Performed analytics, risk management and substantive and controls testing for PCAOB clients.• Executed a pilot project for Deloitte Tie-Out tool and providing prompt feedback to the US Product owners and improve the overall interface tool before firm-wide deployment.• Served as an Onboarding Advisor for new hires to help them assimilate into the corporate culture and work environment .
positions.title: Audit Assistant/ Audit Senior Assistant
positions.description_html:
External Auditor with the Audit and Assurance Practice of Deloitte, primarily handling US-based clients in the Retail, Wholesale & Distribution, (Consumer & Industrial Products) Sector.

Responsibilities:
• Performed analytics, risk management and substantive and controls testing for PCAOB clients.
• Executed a pilot project for Deloitte Tie-Out tool and providing prompt feedback to the US Product owners and improve the overall interface tool before firm-wide deployment.
• Served as an Onboarding Advisor for new hires to help them assimilate into the corporate culture and work environment .

projects: [{"title":"A Study on Management Discussion & Analysis Report (TCS)","start_date":"Jan 2016","end_date":"Mar 2016","description":"The project titled “Management Discussion and Analysis” comprised of various aspects ofthe broad topics being covered by the management in the framing of the MD&A Report.Through this analysis I tried to evaluate the relevance and importance of the contentsthe management discloses through its Annual Report. For this purpose I took theAnnual Report of TCS as a ready reference and based our thoughts and suggestions based onthe Indian context. Now a question may ponder your brain as to why have been IT companieslike TCS have been chosen as a reference and here is why they have been included.The Tata Consultancy Services or simply the TCS has the largest market capitalization in theIndian Stock Market and this is one of the sole and most important reasons to include it in ourstudy as it caters to one of the largest investor and stakeholder’s base.The entire project report had been covered in several stages and parts and I had evaluated thevarious parameters where there was a scope of improvement and have tried our best to justify itto the best of my limited knowledge and efforts."}]
